description: I can bet the list of things you'd want to do with young and sexy captive Chris would be long and exceedingly dirty, but Master Sebastian has something a little more simple in mind. He needs to have a bit of a workout, and he's decided to use the boy as a punching bag! Roped up, hoisted swinging above the dirty mattress the boy takes a pounding, his abs sore and red, his cock aching in his shorts from all the aggressive grabs and slaps. Master even uses boxing gloves to make proper contact, taking a moment to muffle the boys cries with a ball gag before getting back to beating him. It's an intense session and Chris is left a little bruised by the end of it, but that doesn't matter as long as Master got his anger out.
title: Chris Jansen & Sebastian Kane
